subject: Steroids
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Larry Starr, who was the head trainer for the Cincinnati Reds and Florida Marlins, said Wednesday that he shared with investigators his perspective and knowledge on the use of performance-enhancing drugs.
snippet: Larry Starr, who was the head trainer for the Cincinnati Reds and Florida Marlins, said Wednesday that he shared with investigators his perspective and knowledge on the use of performance-enhancing drugs.
